Translations.Text: Tarusi n Tezmamt s$uo Oebbi, Uzmir, Bab n uuwab
Ih, Nessader ak d Tazmamt, s tidep. Ihi, aabed Oebbi, s laaqida i Neppa

Day macci i Oebbi laaqida? Wid ippaddamen imawlan, war Neppa, nnan: "naabed iten kan, iwakken ad a$ rnun aseqoeb ar Oebbi". Ih, Oebbi ad Ieudd garasen, $ef wayen i$ef mgarraden. Oebbi, war ccekk, ur Inehhu win illan d akeddab, d ajehli
Lemmer Ib$i Oebbi ad Isau aqcic, yili Ifren, deg wayen Ixelleq, ayen i S ihwan. Gedha s yiS! Neppa d Oebbi Yiwen, Aqehhao
Ixleq tamurt akked igenwan, s tidep. Innev Iv i wass, Innev ass i yiv. Ieeppem i yiiij akked waggur, ad leun, yal wa, ar lajel ipwassnen. Day Neppa macci d Uzmir Ipsemmieen

Ixelq ikwen si yiwen n lxelq. Irra, segs, tislit is. Issers awen d iam n tyugiwin n lmal. Ixelq ikwen di taabbuvin n tyimmatin nnwen, lxelq deffir lxelq, di krav n tellisat. D wagi ay d Oebbi, Mass nnwen. IneS tagelda, ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa. Amek ihi tugim

Ma tjehlem, Oebbi ur kwen Iewao ara. Ur Ipoadi tijehli i imdanen iS. Ma tesnemmrem, a kwen Ioavi. Ur ipbibbi yiwen taakkwemt n wayev; sinna, ar Mass nnwen tu$alin nnwen; ad awen Imel acu txeddmem. Ih, Neppa, Issen i illan deg idmaren

Amdan, ma ieuza t ccqa, ad inuj ar Mass is, d ucaif $uoes; sinna, ma I$at it s$uoeS, ad ippu ayen i$ef inuj $uoeS, uqbel; ad irr i Oebbi tanudda, ad innetlaf seg ubrid iS. Ini: "zzhu cwii di tijehli k, ihi, kecc seg wat tmes
Day win ippanzen deg iv, ikna u ibedd, ipeebbio i laxeot, issaram aeunu n Mass is…? Ini: "day aadlen wid issnen akked wid ur nessin? Ay d ismektayen, kan, d uaqilen
Ini: "a yimdanen iW iumnen, eezzbet i Mass nnwen. Ayen ilhan i wid imaanen di ddunit agi. Tamurt n Oebbi tewsaa. Ihi, arraz, war aktili, ad ippunefk i iueboiyen
Ini: "nek pwamoe$ d ad aabde$ Oebbi, s laaqida i Neppa
Pwamoe$ d, ad ili$ d amvua amenzu
Ini: "nek, ugade$, ma aaua$ Mass iw, aaaqeb n wass ameqwoaean
Ini: "ad aabde$ Oebbi, s laaqida i Neppa
Ihi, aabdet i wen ihwan, war Neppa". Ini: "imexsuoen d wid iwedoen iman nnsen, akked twacult nnsen, ass n tnekra". Ni$ d tagi ay d taxessaot n uuee
A$embabu n tmes, sennig sen, wayev seddawat sen. Ayagi, Issagwad yis Oebbi imdanen iS: a yimdanen iW, eezzbet iyI
Wid ijunben aabad ioebbiten n tkerkas, u iutuben Oebbi, a ten id ias lfeoe. Ihi, ssefoee imdanen iW
i issemeasen i wawal, teddun d uuam ines. D wigi i Inha Oebbi, d wigi ay d uaqilen
Day win i$ef ippuseyya ad isaaddi aaaqeb, day a psellkev kecc, win illan di tmes
Ma d wid ieezzben i Mass nnsen, ad saun ti$uofatin, bnant ta sennig ta, isaffen seddawat sent ppazzalen, d lemaahda n Oebbi. Oebbi ur Ixeiiu i lemaahda

Ur twalav ara, Oebbi Isse$li d aman, seg igenni, Issekcem iten ad sswen akal. Sinna, yissen, a d Issuffe$ im$an n yal ini, ara iu$alen ad isliwen. A ten twaliv d iwoa$en, sinna, a ten Irr d iquoanen. Deg waya, s tidep, asmekti i uaqilen
Day win iwumi Illi Oebbi, idmaren is, ar wannuz, d$a neppa di tafat s$uo Mass is…? A ssxev n at wulawen iqquoen, ur d smektayen Oebbi! Widak di ttelfan n uuee

Issader ed Oebbi uuam n wawal. Tazmamt, degs acbi, allus. Ad ccirwen segs igwelman akked wulawen n wid ippagwaden Mass nnsen, sinna, igwelman akked wulawen nnsen ad ieninen ar usmekti n Oebbi. D tagi ay d nnhaya n Oebbi. Inehhu yis, win i S ihwan. Win Itlef Oebbi, ur illi wa ara t inhun
Day win ipeezziben, s wudem is, seg uaaqeb ucmit, ass n tnekra…? Ad inin i imednas: "jeoobet ayen tkeppbem
Skaddben wid i ten id izwaren. Iusa ten id uaaqeb, seg wanda ur bnin
Issukk fellasen Oebbi aaaqeb, di tmeddurt n ddunit; war ccekk, aaaqeb n laxeot iugar it, lemmer eeooen
Ni$ Nefka i imdanen, di Leqwoan agi, yal amedya, amar a d mmektin
Leqwoan s taaoabt, ur degs tiaaawji; amar ad eezzben
Ifka d Oebbi amedya n urgaz icerken akked wid ipmerean, u argaz di tifrat akked yiwen urgaz. Day aadlen sin imedyaten? Ccekoan i Oebbi. Xaii, tegwti degsen ur ssinen
War ccekk, kecc a ppemmtev, nitni ad mmten
Sinna, kunwi, ass n tnekra, ar Mass nnwen, a ppemqellaam
Anwa i idensen sennig win iskaddben af Oebbi, iskaddben tidep ma tusa t id? Day macci di Loahennama, i illa uxxam ijehliyen
Wid id iusan s tidep, u pputebbten yis, wigi d wid ipeezziben
Ad saun ayen b$an, ar Mass nnsen. D wagi ay d arraz iaaoviyen
Iwakken ad asen Ikkes Oebbi, ayen xedmen adiran mavi; a ten I$it s wayen xeddmen d amxallef
Day ur Ipqam ara Oebbi amdan iS? La k ssagwaden s wid, war Neppa. Win Itlef Oebbi, ur illi w ara t inhun
Win Inha Oebbi, ur illi w ara t itelfen. Ni$ Oebbi d Uzmir, Bab n ppao

Ma testeqsav ten: "anwa i Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan? Ad inin, war ccekk: d Oebbi". Ini: "ma twalam wigi tnaaoem, war Oebbi, day zemren, ma Ib$a yi Oebbi ccqa, ad kksen ccqa S? Ne$, ma Ib$a yi aeunu, ad ssbeilen aeunu S"? Ini: "Iqennaa iyi Oebbi; fellaS ay ppeklen wid ipkalen
Ini: "a yagdud iw! Xedmet akken tennumen, nek la xeddme$". Deqqal a ppeeoem
anwa u$uo ara d ias uaaqeb ara t isdullen, u$uo ara d irs uaaqeb imezgi
Ih, Nessader ed $uoek, Tazmamt i medden, s tidets. Win ipwanhan, i iman is, win innetlafen, innetlaf kan, mgal is. Ur telliv, kecc, d awkil nnsen
Oebbi Ippaddam leowae mara mmten, akked wid ur nemmut, deg ives nnsen. Iaatteq wid i$ef Iseyya tameppant, Ippara d wiyav, ar lajel ipwassnen. Ih, deg wayagi, ard issekniyen i ugdud ipmeyyizen
Ne$ ad ddmen, war Oebbi, imcafaan? Ini: "i ma ur sain acemma, ur fhimen
Ini: "akw ccafuaa n Oebbi. IneS tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan. Sinna, $uoeS ara tu$alem
Mara d Ipwadder Oebbi Yiwen, ad zemven wulawen n wid ur numin ara s laxeot. Ma pwadren d wid, war Neppa, imiren nitni ad ceoeen
Ini: "a Oebbi! Axellaq n tmurt akked igenwan, Amusnaw n wayen iffren d wayen ivehoen, d Kecc ara Ieudden ger imdanen iK, $ef wayen llan mgarraden
Wid idensen, lemmer nnsen ayen akw i illan di tmurt, rnu yas am neppa, ur ten id ifeddu, seg uaaqeb ucmit, ass n tnekra. Ad asen d iban, s$uo Oebbi, ayen i$ef ur bnin
Ad asen d banent tucmitin kesben, ad asen innev wayen i$ef ttahan
Ma ieuza umdan ccqa, ad a£ d inaao. Sinna, ma Nezger tacvai nne£ fellas, ad yini: "tusa yi d kan si tmusni". Xaii! D ajeooeb, maca aias degsen ur ssinen
Ni$ nnan t id imezwura nnsen. Acu i sen d ibbwi wayen keppben
Iwwet iten wayen kesben n tucmitin. Wid idensen, seg wigi, a ten iwwet wayen kesben n tucmitin. Ur zmiren ad sfunngen
Day ur eoin ara ar Oebbi Ip$iti win i S ihwan, u Iwezzen? Ih, deg waya, ard issekniyen i ugdud iumnen
Ini: "a yimdanen iw i ipeawalen mgal iman nnsen! Ur ppayset aeunu n Oebbi. Ih, Oebbi Ipsemmie akw ibekkaven. Ih, Neppa Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Steooaet i Mass nnwen, anzet aS, uqbel a kwen id ias uaaqeb, d$a ula ikwen isellken
Ddut d uuam n wayen i wen d irsen, s$uo Mass nnwen, uqbel a kwen id ias uaaqeb, deqzalla, kunwi ur tebnim
u a d yini ooue: "a ssexv iw, $ef wayen stehza$ ar loiha n Oebbi! Lli$, s tidep, seg wid ittihin
Ne$ a d yini: "lemmer iyi Inha Oebbi, yili lli$ seg wid ipeezziben
Ne$ a d yini mara iwali aaaqeb: "lemmer iyi illi wallus, ad ili$ si lauuam
Xaii! Usan k id issekniyen iW, teskaddbev ten, tzuxxev, telliv seg ijehliyen
Ass n tnekra, a pwaliv berrikit wudmawen n wid id igren tikerkas af Oebbi. Day macci di Loahennama, i illa uxxam imzuxiyen
Ad Isellek Oebbi wid ieezzben; ar rebeen. Ur ten ikkat wugur, ur $webbnen
Oebbi Ixleq yal cci. Neppa d Awkil n yal cci
IneS tsura n tmurt akked igenwan. Wid inekoen issekniyen n Oebbi, widak d imexsuoen
Ini: "day ad yi tamoem ad aabde$, war Oebbi, a wid ur nessin
Ni$ iusa k id uweeei, u $eo wid i k izwaren. Ma tcurkev, ad meun igiten ik, a ppiliv seg imexsuoen
Xaii! Aabed Oebbi. Ili seg wid isnemmiren
Ur qudoen ara Oebbi, azal n lqedo iS. Akw tamurt, ass n tnekra, di tumeet iS. Igenwan ad nnefvasen deg ufus iS ayeffus. Gedha s yiS! I Aalay sennig wayen pcaraken
Auuvu di lbuq: ad ixsef i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt, kkes ed i S ihwan i Oebbi. Auuvu nniven: nitni a d kkren pmuqulen
A pfeooeo tmurt, si tafat n Mass is. A d ters Tezmamt, a d awin lambiyya akked inagan. Ad aaddin di ccoaa, s tidep, ur pwadensen
Yal yiwen ad i$ellet ayen ixdem. Neppa, Yif akw akken Issen, d acu xeddmen

Ad pwanehoen wid ijehlen, d igrawen, ar Loahennama. Mi bbwven $uoes, u llint tebbura s, ad asen inin iassasen is: "day ur kwen in usan ara imazanen, segwen, mmalen awen issekniyen n Mass nnwen, nedoen kwen af temlilit n wass nnwen agi"? A d inin: "Ih. Maca, ad iuao wawal uaaqeb, af ijehliyen
A d inin: "kecmet si tebbura, ar Loahennama! Degs, wekkoet". Ay d ucmit uxxam n imzuxiyen
Wid ieezzben i Mass nnsen, ad pwanehoen ar Loennet, d igrawen. Mi bbwven $uoes, u llint tebbura s, ad asen inin iassasen is: "tifrat fellawen, tgerzem; kecmet ep, twekkoem
Ad inin: "ccekoan i Oebbi i $ Issawven lemaahda S. Ifka ya$ tamurt d lweot; a nili, di Loennet, anda i $ ihwa. A yarraz asaadi n wid ixeddmen lxio
A pwaliv lmalayek zzint ed i usgeld, sbuccuaent s ccekoan Mass nnsent. Iaadda ccoaa garasen, s tidep. Ad inin: "a neckeo Oebbi, Mass imavalen
